attributes.action: Compel offshore funds to rescue British citizens and businesses.
attributes.additional_details: Pass an act to a) make these offshore accounts transparent and b) tax them to help fund the British economy's restart package.
attributes.background: There are billions of pounds held offshore.  It is not fair that the British people should have to endure further austerity or taxation measures when this money is sitting abroad.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. The UK Government is only responsible for taxation on funds held in its jurisdiction.
                
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign: 

Work internationally to ban use of tax havens for offshore banking: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332689

Increase Corporation Tax and tackle tax avoidance to fund economic recovery: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320783

Windfall Tax Profits made by Companies during the Covid 19 Pandemic: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555131
